chinese: 何草不黃、何日不行。何人不將、經營四方。
english: Every plant is yellow;Every day we march.Every man is moving about,Doing service in some quarter of the kingdom.

chinese: 何草不玄、何人不矜。哀我征夫、獨為匪民。
english: Every plant is purple;Every man is torn from his wife.Alas for us employed on these expeditions!How are we alone dealt with as if we were not men?

chinese: 匪兕匪虎、率彼曠野。哀我征夫、朝夕不暇。
english: We are not rhinoceroses, we are not tigers,To be kept in these desolate wilds.Alas for us employed on these expeditions!Morning and night we have no leisure.

chinese: 有芃者狐、率彼幽草。有棧之車、行彼周道。
english: The long-tailed foxes,May keep among the dark grass.And our box-carts,Keep moving along the great roads.
